steps.notes: Mine mare regolith from surface
Screen and separate size fractions
Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Cut steel plate or sheet stock into rough parts for downstream machining/forming

recipe_def.assumptions: Generic cutting path; downstream finishing handled in later recipes for specific parts. 5% material loss from cutting operations.
recipe_def.notes: Produce cut_parts from steel plate or sheet stock using basic cutting operations; includes sawing, shearing, or plasma cutting.
Roughly machine 2 kg of cut_parts into machined_part_raw

steps.notes: Deburring and finishing of machined_part_raw to produce finished_part_deburred

recipe_def.notes: Deburring step converts machined_part_raw into a deburred finished_part_deburred; input is assumed to be available as machined_part_raw via upstream processes.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for finished_part_deburred

steps.notes: Cast metal part in sand mold or permanent mold with 5-10 mm excess material on all critical dimensions for finishing allowance
Rough machine part to approximate dimensions, leaving 1-3 mm stock for finish machining; establish datum surfaces and rough bore holes

recipe_def.assumptions: Rough-machined or as-cast metal part with excess material for finishing operations. 1 kg typical mass. Rough dimensions with 1 mm tolerance. Surface finish is rough (Ra 6-25 m). Requires subsequent precision machining, grinding, or finishing to achieve final dimensions and surface quality. Used as intermediate product in precision part manufacturing.
recipe_def.notes: Production of rough part via casting and rough machining. Total processing time ~5 hours. Part intentionally oversized to allow for final finishing operations that achieve tight tolerances and smooth surfaces. Common for gears, shafts, housings, and machine tool components.

steps.notes: Cast small fastener blanks in batches
Machine threads and head forms for small bolts and screws
Sort and kit small fasteners by size

recipe_def.assumptions: Small fastener kit with mixed bolts, nuts, washers for light assemblies. M3-M8 sizes.
recipe_def.notes:
Small fastener kit for electronics, instrumentation, and light mechanical assemblies.

Sequential processing: cast  machine  kit. Uses metal alloy for casting fastener blanks.

steps.notes: Cast steel blocks in precision molds for gauge block blanks
Harden steel blocks through austenitizing and quenching cycle
Precision grind all six faces to exact dimensions with flatness within 0.0001 inch tolerance
Verify dimensional accuracy and surface finish of each gauge block

recipe_def.assumptions: Hardened steel construction with precision grinding. Set includes common gauge block sizes for calibration and measurement.
recipe_def.notes: Precision gauge block set for dimensional reference and calibration. Hardened steel blocks ground to extreme flatness and dimensional accuracy for use in quality control and machine setup.

steps.notes: Cast caliper beam and jaws blanks (steel).
Precision machine slide surfaces, jaws, and scale/gear features.
Assemble slider, scale (vernier/dial), and lock; calibrate.

recipe_def.assumptions: Vernier/dial scale; digital electronics imported if used.
recipe_def.notes: Fabrication and assembly of precision calipers.

steps.notes: Machine frame, spindle, anvil, thimble, barrel from precision steel
Heat treat for dimensional stability
Grind spindle, anvil, measuring faces to precision tolerances
Assemble spindle, thimble, ratchet stop, frame
Calibrate against gauge blocks, verify accuracy

inputs.notes: Precision tool steel for frames, spindles, anvils
Assembly hardware for ratchet stops and frames

recipe_def.assumptions: Precision micrometers with 0.01mm or 0.001" resolution. Set includes various sizes.
recipe_def.notes: Set of precision micrometers for dimensional measurement with calibrated accuracy.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for micrometer set

steps.notes: Machine precision gear mechanisms, spindles, and dial faces for indicators
Assemble indicator mechanisms with precision gearing and spring return
Calibrate dial indicators against gauge blocks for accuracy verification
Verify measurement accuracy and repeatability across full range

inputs.notes: Precision steel for indicator body and spindle
Precision gears for magnification mechanism (using spur_gear_set_v0 as small gear equivalent)

recipe_def.assumptions: Mechanical dial indicators with gear-driven display. Steel construction with hardened measurement surfaces.
recipe_def.notes: Dial indicator set for precision dimensional measurement. Used in machining, inspection, and quality control.

steps.notes: Machine precision gauge blocks, calipers, micrometer frames
Assemble mechanical measurement tools
Assemble electronic measurement instruments
Calibrate measurement devices against standards

recipe_def.assumptions: Electronic components for multimeters fabricated or imported.
recipe_def.notes: Metrology and measurement equipment for quality control.
